title: Yolanda, la hija del corsario negro
overview: Jolanda is the intrepid and combative daughter of the Black Corsair, a noble who turned to piracy to fight against the oppression of Duke Wan Guld, governor of the Spanish colony of Maracaibo, a city in the Caribbean Sea. The Black Corsair and his brothers were killed when Jolanda was a child, but one day the protagonist appears to her the ghost of her father, who asks her to resume her fight and track down a legendary hidden treasure, with which to put an end to the misery of the population. oppressed by Wan Guld.
